name: Last Light In The Night
description:
Last Light in the Night:

You have been challenged by your friends to visit an abandoned mansion. There, you find a mysterious mirror that sends you in a haunted version of this mansion. Use your torchlight to find a way out from the darkness.
5+ minutes of gameplay.  

The Team

Last Light in the Night  is a Horror Game prototype made as a Game Design assignment during our 2nd Term in the Independent Video Game Design AEC program at Dawson College, Montreal!

PC Controls:
WASD, Arrow Keys - Move Around
Left Click - Open/Close flash light

Xbox Controller:
Left Stick - Move around
X Button - Open/Close flash light

Instructions:
Use your torchlight to eliminate the ghosts on your way. Stay away from the armors, they will slice you in two. Activate interrupters to open doors and try to leave this place.
